author: jacopoc
msg: Call the overloaded method instead of duplicating its content.

author: jacopoc
msg: EntityConfig now implements the singleton pattern; thread safety is implemented with a static initialization.

Removed the EntityConfigUtil class whose main purpose was to guarantee that only one instance of EntityConfig would be initialized (no more required since now EntityConfig is a singleton); moved a couple of its static methods to the EntityConfig class.

author: arp
msg: HDFS-6899: Merging r1619970 from trunk to branch-2.
